name: TETRONIMUS
description:
*** ATTENTION ***  

A really simple HOME MADE application.

*** WARNING ***

For ANDROID-->This application only works on TABLET MEDIACOM and DIGILAND -> Armv5. (Armv7 - x86 - Mips - Win10 -> on request).

If you do not have these models, do not download, do not install, do not watch, do not run this APK.

This APK NOThas:

# no music
# no sound
# no SVAE-STATE-PROGRESS
# no internet connection
# no advertising
# no ADS...... nothing at all.

If you want a professional APK you have to look elsewhere.

This DEMO - APK has only one screen to try.
